## Problem
What problem does this proposal solve?

## Proposed Change
What would you add, change, or remove?

## Affected Sections
Which parts of the spec would this touch?

## Backwards Compatible?
- [ ] Yes — existing implementations unaffected
- [ ] No — breaking change (explain below)
